author: Max
title: Tokenizing GitHub Pull request
description: Developers want to contribute to projects but at the same time they want to be rewarded either by token of appreciation or recognition.

assessments.note: This proposal meets the incentivization structure aspect of the challenge while keeping a focus on developers.

The proposal has identified a suitable problem and somewhat effectively addresses the challenge but appears incomplete in terms of planning and design at this stage. Further development of the proposal will likely have positive results.

First of all, this is an excellent idea in general. Though this may not specifically target Cardano development echosystem, I suppose there´s where the adoption will begin. One risk would be that this could incentivize contributor behavior that is not optimal for the supported project.
There is no design doc, and the option proposed is quite opposite to the decentralisation goal of blockchain.

The planned collaboration between the proposer and another developer appears to be sufficient for the scope of the work. A higher score would have been allocated if said developer would be already known and deemed as knowledgeable enough to implement the proposal within the allotted timeframe.

The proposer appears to have sufficient experience and understanding of the necessary skills to go forward with this proposal. I did feel that some things remained unanswered at this stage and further collaboration will benefit the overall proposal.

The proposal states that there are some gaps in the team behind the proposal. Finding the right competence is essential to fulfill this. I would prefer if the required team emmbers were on-board before the proposal were written.

Sufficient information was provided but I still had some questions not fully answered. The links provided did not always work and I just felt further work to tease out the proposal will deliver a much more polished application. I feel further technical collaboration would benefit at this stage.
The proposer should give more information to back up the case of how this proposal addresses the challenge. How does it help the developer focus on building successful apps?
The proposal contains most essential parts, what could make it even better is to add a set of deliverables and a rough timeplan.

solution: An extension on GitHub that allow any project owner to tokenised the PR (Pull request) and reward contributors with ADA.
experience: Developer, mostly working on Frontend (JavaScript, React, ReasonML)
